title: Oakwood
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Scottish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An old-fashioned quirky restaurant on the banks of Loch Ness, 5 miles south of Inverness. Makes mainly traditional Scottish food. Has a separate vegetarian section with a few vegan choices that are marked. Menu states to mention if you are vegan. Owners understand vegan and vegetarian food differences. BYOB.
